explanation.en: APL solution for Palindromic Substrings. Uses reverse (⌽) to flip array elements. Uses tally (≢) to count array length. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.zh-CN: Palindromic Substrings 的 APL 解决方案。使用反转 (⌽) 翻转数组元素。使用 tally (≢) 计算数组长度。实现使用 APL 的面向数组原语进行简洁表达。
explanation.zh-TW: Palindromic Substrings 的 APL 解決方案。使用反轉 (⌽) 翻轉陣列元素。使用 tally (≢) 計算陣列長度。實現使用 APL 的面向陣列原語進行簡潔表達。
explanation.ja: APL solution for Palindromic Substrings. Uses reverse (⌽) to flip array elements. Uses tally (≢) to count array length. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.es: APL solution for Palindromic Substrings. Uses reverse (⌽) to flip array elements. Uses tally (≢) to count array length. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
